column1: We just have one question, though. We were looking over some of your lyrics, uh... "I want to walk hand-in-hand with Jesus on a private beach for two.-I want him to nibble on my ear and say 'I'm here for you.'" Ih...it seems you really love Christ.
Eh no but ih it appears you are actually... in love with Christ.
Well uh of course I do. I mean I just-
Uh, we'd just like to make sure the bands we sign are in it for God, and not for the money.
That's- all we needed to know. Just, sign here and we'll get your album sold.
According to the letter, sir, the town has a tobacco company quite near them.
